titles.title: Jesus, What A Wonder You Are

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, what a wonder You are You are so gentle, so pure, and so kind. You shine like the Morning Star Jesus, what a wonder You are.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah, Jesus is my everything. Hallelujah, Jesus is my Lord and King.{/lang-eng}
